front.title: An Alternative Connection Model for the Message Session Relay Protocol (MSRP)

abstract.t: This document defines an alternative connection model for MSRP UAs. The model differs from the standard MSRP model, as defined in RFC4975 and RFC4976, in that it uses SDP in a more conventional way when it comes to conveying endpoint address information, and also uses mainstream mechanisms for NAT traversal instead of using MSRP relays.
